00054 /*
00055  * Pointer to function that will handle new connections' events.
00056  */
00057 static void (*connect_handler)(int session) = NULL;
00058 
00059 /*============================================================================*/
00060 /* Private functions prototypes.                                              */

00062 
00063 /*
00064  * Creates the verifier used in session closing.
00065  * 
00066  * @param session - the session to compute the verifier.
00067  * @return LLP_OK if no errors occurred, LLP_ERROR otherwise.
00068  */
00069 static int compute_verifier(int session);
00070 
00071 /*
00072  * Creates the needed keys for a session using its session information.
00073  * 
00074  * @param session - the session to create the keys.
00075  * @return LLP_OK if no errors occurred, LLP_ERROR otherwise.
00076  */
00077 static int create_keys(int session);
00078 
00079 /*
00080  * Checks if the remote and local protocol versions are compatible.
00081  * 
00082  * @param remote_major - major version of remote node's protocol implementation.
00083  * @param remote_minor - minor version of remote node's protocol implementation.
00084  * @return LLP_OK if the protocols are compatible, LLP_ERROR otherwise.
00085  */
00086 static int verify_versions(u_char remote_major, u_char remote_minor);
00087 
00094 static inline int send_connection_request(int session);
00095 
00096 /*
00097  * Sends a LLP_CONNECTION_OK packet, trying to connect to the port specified in
00098  * the UDP header of the LLP_CONNECTION_REQUEST packet.
00099  * 
00100  * @param session - the session to send the packet.
00101  * @return LLP_OK if no errors occurred, LLP_ERROR otherwise.
00102  */
00103 static inline int send_connection_ok(int session);
00104 
00105 /*
00106  * Sends a LLP_KEY_EXCHANGE packet.
00107  * 
00108  * @param session - the session to send the packet.
00109  * @return LLP_OK if no errors occurred, LLP_ERROR otherwise.
00110  */
00111 static inline int send_key_exchange(int session);
00112 
00113 /*
00114  * Reads the contents of a LLP_CONNECTION_REQUEST into packet.
00115  * 
00116  * @param packet - packet representing the parsed data.
00117  * @param packet_data - data to parse.
00118  * @param packet_length - length of the packet buffer, in bytes.
00119  * @return LLP_OK if no parsing errors occurred, LLP_ERROR otherwise.
00120  */
00121 static inline int parse_connection_request(llp_packet_p *packet, 
00122                 u_char *packet_data, int packet_length);
00123                 
00124 /*
00125  * Reads the contents of a LLP_CONNECTION_OK into packet.
00126  * 
00127  * @param packet - packet representing the parsed data.
00128  * @param packet_data - data to parse.
00129  * @param packet_length - length of the packet buffer, in bytes.
00130  * @return LLP_OK if no parsing errors occurred, LLP_ERROR otherwise.
00131  */
00132 static inline int parse_connection_ok(llp_packet_p *packet, u_char *packet_data,
00133                 int packet_length);
00134                 
00135 /*
00136  * Reads the contents of a LLP_KEY_EXCHANGE into packet.
00137  * 
00138  * @param packet - packet representing the parsed data.
00139  * @param packet_data - data to parse.
00140  * @param packet_length - length of the packet buffer, in bytes.
00141  * @return LLP_OK if no parsing errors occurred, LLP_ERROR otherwise.
00142  */
00143 static int parse_key_exchange(llp_packet_p *packet, u_char *packet_data,
00144                 int packet_length);

00146 /*============================================================================*/
00147 /* Public functions implementations.                                          */
00148 /*============================================================================*/
00149 
00150 int llp_handle_connection_request(u_char *packet_data, int packet_length,
00151                 struct sockaddr_in *peer) {
00152         int session;
00153         int return_value;
00154         llp_packet_p packet;
00155 
00156         /* Seeing if the new connection won't trespass the connection limit. */
00157         if (llp_get_active_sessions_counter() >= llp_get_max_connections()) {
00158                 liblog_warn(LAYER_LINK, "maximum number of connections reached.");
00159                 return LLP_ERROR;
00160         }
00161 
00162         if (parse_connection_request(&packet, packet_data, packet_length)
00163                         == LLP_ERROR) {
00164                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "packet format corrupted.");   
00165                 return LLP_ERROR;
00166         } 
00167 
00168         /* Verifying protocol versions. */
00169         if (verify_versions(packet.llp_connection_request.major_version,
00170                         packet.llp_connection_request.minor_version) == LLP_ERROR) {
00171                 return LLP_ERROR;
00172         }
00173         
00174         /* Checking if this node is already connected. */
00175         if (llp_get_session_by_address(peer) != LLP_ERROR) {
00176                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "node already connected.");
00177                 return LLP_ERROR;
00178         }
00179 
00180         /* Reserving a session to this connection. */
00181         session = llp_get_free_session(LLP_STATE_BEING_CONNECTED);
00182         if (session == LLP_ERROR) {
00183                 liblog_warn(LAYER_LINK, "no free sessions available.");
00184                 return LLP_ERROR;
00185         }
00186         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "using session: %d.", session);
00187         
00188         llp_lock_session(session);
00189 
00190         /* Fill up the session info. */
00191         /* The port is extracted from the packet header. */
00192         memcpy(&llp_sessions[session].address, peer, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00193         llp_sessions[session].foreign_session =
00194                         packet.llp_connection_request.session;
00195         llp_sessions[session].cipher = 
00196                         llp_cipher_search(packet.llp_connection_request.ciphers);
00197         llp_sessions[session].hash =
00198                         llp_hash_search(packet.llp_connection_request.hashes);
00199         llp_sessions[session].mac =
00200                         llp_mac_search(packet.llp_connection_request.macs);
00201         memcpy(llp_sessions[session].h_in, packet.llp_connection_request.h,
00202                         LLP_H_LENGTH);  
00203 
00204         /* Functions received don't support even the defaults. */
00205         if (llp_sessions[session].cipher == NULL ||
00206                         llp_sessions[session].hash == NULL ||
00207                         llp_sessions[session].mac == NULL) {
00208                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK,
00209                                 "received functions not supported, packet dropped.");
00210                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00211                 goto return_label;
00212         }
00213         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "received functions are supported.");
00214         
00215         llp_sessions[session].encrypted = (
00216                         strncmp(llp_sessions[session].cipher->name, UTIL_NULL_CIPHER,
00217                         strlen(UTIL_NULL_CIPHER)) == 0 ?
00218                         LLP_SESSION_NOT_ENCRYPTED : LLP_SESSION_ENCRYPTED);
00219 
00220         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "session %d is now in BEING_CONNECTED state.",
00221                         session);
00222 
00223         /* Generating Diffie & Hellman parameters. */
00224         if (llp_compute_dh_params(llp_sessions[session].x,
00225                         llp_sessions[session].y_out) == LLP_ERROR) {
00226                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating D&H parameters.");
00227                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00228                 goto return_label;
00229         }
00230         
00231         /* Generatin h_out parameter. */
00232         if (util_rand_bytes(llp_sessions[session].h_out, LLP_H_LENGTH)
00233                         == UTIL_ERROR) {
00234                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating h parameter.");
00235                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00236                 goto return_label;              
00237         };
00238         
00239         /* Send request packet. */
00240         if (send_connection_ok(session) == LLP_ERROR) {
00241                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00242                 goto return_label;
00243         }
00244         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "LLP_CONNECTION_OK packet sent.");
00245 
00246         return_value = LLP_OK;
00247 
00248 return_label:
00249 
00250         if (return_value == LLP_ERROR) {
00251                 llp_close_session(session);
00252         }
00253         llp_unlock_session(session);
00254 
00255         return return_value;
00256 }
00257 /******************************************************************************/
00258 int llp_handle_connection_ok(u_char *packet_data, int packet_length) {
00259         int session;
00260         int return_value;
00261         llp_packet_p packet;
00262 
00263         /* Reading packet */
00264         if (parse_connection_ok(&packet, packet_data, packet_length) == LLP_ERROR) {
00265                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "packet format corrupted.");   
00266                 return LLP_ERROR;
00267         } 
00268 
00269         session = packet.llp_connection_ok.session_dst;
00270         llp_lock_session(session);
00271         
00272         /* Fill up the session info. */
00273         llp_sessions[session].state = LLP_STATE_ESTABLISHED;
00274         llp_sessions[session].foreign_session = packet.llp_connection_ok.session_src;
00275         llp_sessions[session].timeout = LLP_T_TIMEOUT;
00276         llp_sessions[session].silence = 0;
00277         llp_sessions[session].hunt_time = 0;
00278         llp_sessions[session].alive = 0;
00279         llp_sessions[session].error = LLP_OK;
00280         llp_sessions[session].cipher =
00281                         llp_cipher_search(packet.llp_connection_ok.cipher);
00282         llp_sessions[session].hash = llp_hash_search(packet.llp_connection_ok.hash);
00283         llp_sessions[session].mac = llp_mac_search(packet.llp_connection_ok.mac);       
00284         llp_sessions[session].encrypted = (
00285                         strncmp(llp_sessions[session].cipher->name, UTIL_NULL_CIPHER,
00286                         strlen(UTIL_NULL_CIPHER)) == 0 ?
00287                         LLP_SESSION_NOT_ENCRYPTED : LLP_SESSION_ENCRYPTED);
00288         memcpy(llp_sessions[session].h_in, packet.llp_connection_ok.h,
00289                         LLP_H_LENGTH);
00290         memcpy(llp_sessions[session].y_in, packet.llp_connection_ok.y,
00291                         LLP_Y_LENGTH);
00292 
00293         /* Setting node state in nodes cache. */
00294         llp_set_node_active(&llp_sessions[session].address, session);
00295         
00296         /* Correcting number of active sessions. */
00297         llp_add_active_sessions_counter(1);
00298         
00299         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "session %d is now in ESTABLISHED state.",
00300                         session);
00301 
00302         /* Functions received don't support even the defaults. */
00303         if (llp_sessions[session].cipher == NULL ||
00304                         llp_sessions[session].hash == NULL ||
00305                         llp_sessions[session].mac == NULL) {
00306                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK,
00307                                 "received function not supported, packet dropped.");
00308                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00309                 goto return_label;              
00310         }
00311         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "received functions are supported.");
00312 
00313         if (llp_compute_dh_params(llp_sessions[session].x,
00314                         llp_sessions[session].y_out) == LLP_ERROR) {
00315                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating D&H parameters.");
00316                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00317                 goto return_label;              
00318         }
00319         
00320         /* Computing Diffie & Hellman shared secret z. */
00321         if (llp_compute_dh_secret(llp_sessions[session].z, 
00322                         llp_sessions[session].y_in, llp_sessions[session].x) == LLP_ERROR) {
00323                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating D&H secret.");
00324                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00325                 goto return_label;                              
00326         }
00327         
00328         /* Compute verifier. */
00329         if (compute_verifier(session) == LLP_ERROR) {
00330                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating verifier.");
00331                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00332                 goto return_label;                              
00333         }
00334 
00335         /* Create all the keys. */
00336         if (create_keys(session) == LLP_ERROR) {
00337                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating session keys.");
00338                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00339                 goto return_label;                              
00340         };
00341         
00342         /* Send key exchange packet. */
00343         if (send_key_exchange(session) == LLP_ERROR) {
00344                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00345                 goto return_label;              
00346         }
00347         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "LLP_KEY_EXCHANGE packet sent.");
00348 
00349         llp_unlock_session(session);
00350 
00351         /* Calling the registered callback function. */
00352         if (connect_handler != NULL) {
00353                 connect_handler(session);
00354         }
00355 
00356         return_value = LLP_OK;
00357 
00358 return_label:
00359 
00360         if (return_value == LLP_ERROR) {
00361                 llp_close_session(session);
00362         }
00363         llp_unlock_session(session);
00364 
00365         return return_value;
00366 }
00367 /******************************************************************************/
00368 int llp_handle_key_exchange(u_char *packet_data, int packet_length) {
00369         int session;
00370         int return_value;
00371         llp_packet_p packet;
00372         
00373         /* Reading packet */
00374         if (parse_key_exchange(&packet, packet_data, packet_length)     == LLP_ERROR) {
00375                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "packet format corrupted.");   
00376                 return LLP_ERROR;
00377         } 
00378         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "packet successfuly parsed."); 
00379         
00380         session = packet.llp_key_exchange.session;
00381         llp_lock_session(session);
00382         
00383         /* Updating the session info. */
00384         llp_sessions[session].state = LLP_STATE_ESTABLISHED;
00385         llp_sessions[session].timeout = LLP_T_TIMEOUT;
00386         llp_sessions[session].alive = 0;
00387         llp_sessions[session].error = LLP_OK;
00388         memcpy(llp_sessions[session].y_in, packet.llp_key_exchange.y,
00389                         LLP_Y_LENGTH);
00390 
00391         /* Adding node to cache. */
00392         llp_add_node_to_cache(&llp_sessions[session].address);
00393         llp_set_node_active(&llp_sessions[session].address, session);
00394         
00395         /* Correcting number of active sessions. */
00396         llp_add_active_sessions_counter(1);
00397         
00398         /* Computing Diffie & Hellman shared secret z. */
00399         if (llp_compute_dh_secret(llp_sessions[session].z, 
00400                         llp_sessions[session].y_in,     llp_sessions[session].x) == LLP_ERROR) {
00401                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating D&H secret.");
00402                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00403                 goto return_label;                                              
00404         }
00405         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "D&H secret z computed.");
00406         
00407         /* Compute verifier. */
00408         if (compute_verifier(session) == LLP_ERROR) {
00409                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating verifier.");
00410                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00411                 goto return_label;                              
00412         }
00413 
00414         /* Create all the keys. */
00415         if (create_keys(session) == LLP_ERROR) {
00416                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating session keys.");
00417                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00418                 goto return_label;                                              
00419         };
00420         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "keys created.");
00421         
00422         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "session %d is now in ESTABLISHED state.",
00423                         session);
00424         
00425         llp_unlock_session(session);
00426 
00427         /* Calling the registered callback function. */
00428         if (connect_handler != NULL) {
00429                 connect_handler(session);
00430         }
00431 
00432         return_value = LLP_OK;
00433 
00434 return_label:
00435 
00436         if (return_value == LLP_ERROR) {
00437                 llp_close_session(session);
00438         }
00439         llp_unlock_session(session);
00440 
00441         return return_value;
00442 }
00443 /******************************************************************************/
00444 int llp_connect_to(struct sockaddr_in *address) {
00445         int session;
00446         int return_value;
00447         
00448         /* Seeing if the new connection won't trespass the connection limit. */
00449         if (llp_get_active_sessions_counter() >= llp_get_max_connections()) {
00450                 liblog_warn(LAYER_LINK, "maximum number of connections reached.");
00451                 return LLP_ERROR;
00452         }
00453         
00454         /* Checking if this node is already connected. */
00455         if (llp_get_session_by_address(address) != LLP_ERROR) {
00456                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "node already connected.");
00457                 return LLP_ERROR;
00458         }
00459         
00460         /* Getting a free session identifier. */
00461         session = llp_get_free_session(LLP_STATE_CONNECTING);
00462         if (session == LLP_ERROR) {
00463                 liblog_warn(LAYER_LINK, "no free sessions available.");
00464                 return LLP_ERROR;
00465         }
00466         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "using session: %d.", session);
00467         
00468         llp_lock_session(session);
00469         
00470         /* Generating h_out. */
00471         if (util_rand_bytes(llp_sessions[session].h_out, LLP_H_LENGTH)
00472                         == UTIL_ERROR) {
00473                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "can't generate random bytes for h.");
00474                 llp_close_session(session);
00475                 llp_unlock_session(session);
00476                 return LLP_ERROR;
00477         }
00478         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "parameter h_out generated.");
00479         
00480         /* Fix session info. */
00481         llp_sessions[session].address.sin_family = AF_INET;
00482         llp_sessions[session].address.sin_port = address->sin_port;
00483         memcpy(&llp_sessions[session].address.sin_addr, &address->sin_addr,
00484                         sizeof(struct in_addr));
00485         llp_sessions[session].timeout = LLP_T_TIMEOUT;
00486         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "session %d is now in CONNECTING state.",
00487                         session);
00488         
00489         /* Adding node to cache. */
00490         llp_add_node_to_cache(&llp_sessions[session].address);
00491         llp_set_node_connecting(&llp_sessions[session].address, session);
00492         return_value = send_connection_request(session);
00493         
00494         llp_unlock_session(session);
00495         
00496         if (return_value == LLP_ERROR) {
00497                 llp_close_session(session);
00498                 return LLP_ERROR;
00499         }
00500         
00501         return LLP_OK;
00502 }
00503 /******************************************************************************/
00504 int llp_connect_any() {
00505         struct sockaddr_in address;
00506         
00507         if (llp_get_nodes_from_cache(1, &address) == LLP_ERROR)
00508                 return LLP_ERROR;
00509         return llp_connect_to(&address);
00510 }
00511 /******************************************************************************/
00512 int llp_register_connect(void (*handler)(int session)) {
00513         if (connect_handler == NULL) {
00514                 connect_handler = handler;
00515                 return LLP_OK;
00516         }
00517         
00518         return LLP_ERROR;
00519 }
00520 /******************************************************************************/
00521 int llp_unregister_connect() {
00522         if (connect_handler == NULL) {
00523                 return LLP_ERROR;
00524         }
00525         
00526         connect_handler = NULL;
00527         return LLP_OK;
00528 }
00529 
00530 /*============================================================================*/
00531 /* Private functions implementations.                                         */
00532 /*============================================================================*/
00533 
00534 int compute_verifier(int session) {
00535         u_char *verifier;
00536         int hash_length;
00537         
00538         hash_length = llp_sessions[session].hash->length;
00539         
00540         verifier = (u_char *)malloc(hash_length);
00541         if (verifier == NULL) {
00542                 liblog_fatal(LAYER_LINK, "error in malloc: %s", strerror(errno));
00543                 return LLP_ERROR;
00544         }
00545         
00546         /* Computing HASH(z). */
00547         llp_sessions[session].hash->function(verifier, llp_sessions[session].z,
00548                         hash_length);
00549         
00550         if (llp_set_verifier(session, verifier) == LLP_ERROR) {
00551                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating verifier.");
00552                 free(verifier);
00553                 return LLP_ERROR;
00554         }
00555         
00556         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "verifier generated.");
00557         
00558         free(verifier);
00559         return LLP_OK;
00560 }
00561 /******************************************************************************/
00562 int create_keys(int session) {
00563         u_char *cipher_key;
00564         u_char *cipher_iv;
00565         u_char *mac_key;
00566         int return_value;
00567         
00568         /* Allocating memory for temporary key containers. */
00569         cipher_key = (u_char *)malloc(llp_sessions[session].cipher->key_length);
00570         cipher_iv = (u_char *)malloc(llp_sessions[session].cipher->iv_length);
00571         mac_key = (u_char *)malloc(llp_sessions[session].mac->key_length);
00572         
00573         if (cipher_key == NULL || cipher_iv == NULL || mac_key == NULL) {
00574                 liblog_fatal(LAYER_LINK, "error in malloc: %s", strerror(errno));
00575                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00576                 goto return_label;
00577         }
00578 
00579         if (util_create_key(
00580                         cipher_key, 
00581                         llp_sessions[session].cipher->key_length,
00582                         llp_sessions[session].z,
00583                         llp_sessions[session].h_in,
00584                         LLP_H_LENGTH,
00585                         "key",
00586                         llp_sessions[session].hash) == LLP_ERROR
00587                                 || llp_set_cipher_in_key(session, cipher_key) == LLP_ERROR) {
00588                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating cipher_in_key.");
00589                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00590                 goto return_label;
00591         }
00592         
00593         if (util_create_key(
00594                         cipher_iv, 
00595                         llp_sessions[session].cipher->iv_length,
00596                         llp_sessions[session].z,
00597                         llp_sessions[session].h_in,
00598                         LLP_H_LENGTH,
00599                         "iv",
00600                         llp_sessions[session].hash) == LLP_ERROR
00601                                 || llp_set_cipher_in_iv(session, cipher_iv) == LLP_ERROR) {
00602                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating cipher_in_iv.");
00603                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00604                 goto return_label;
00605         }
00606         
00607         if (util_create_key(
00608                         cipher_key, 
00609                         llp_sessions[session].cipher->key_length,
00610                         llp_sessions[session].z,
00611                         llp_sessions[session].h_out,
00612                         LLP_H_LENGTH,
00613                         "key",
00614                         llp_sessions[session].hash) == LLP_ERROR
00615                                 || llp_set_cipher_out_key(session, cipher_key) == LLP_ERROR) {
00616                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating cipher_out_key.");
00617                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00618                 goto return_label;
00619         }
00620         
00621         if (util_create_key(
00622                         cipher_iv, 
00623                         llp_sessions[session].cipher->iv_length,
00624                         llp_sessions[session].z,
00625                         llp_sessions[session].h_out,
00626                         LLP_H_LENGTH,
00627                         "iv",
00628                         llp_sessions[session].hash) == LLP_ERROR
00629                                 || llp_set_cipher_out_iv(session, cipher_iv) == LLP_ERROR) {
00630                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating cipher_out_iv.");
00631                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00632                 goto return_label;
00633         }
00634         
00635         if (util_create_key(
00636                         mac_key, 
00637                         llp_sessions[session].mac->key_length,
00638                         llp_sessions[session].z,
00639                         llp_sessions[session].h_in,
00640                         LLP_H_LENGTH,
00641                         "mac",
00642                         llp_sessions[session].hash) == LLP_ERROR
00643                                 || llp_set_mac_in_key(session, mac_key) == LLP_ERROR) {
00644                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating mac_in_key.");
00645                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00646                 goto return_label;
00647         }
00648         
00649         if (util_create_key(
00650                         mac_key, 
00651                         llp_sessions[session].mac->key_length,
00652                         llp_sessions[session].z,
00653                         llp_sessions[session].h_out,
00654                         LLP_H_LENGTH,
00655                         "mac",
00656                         llp_sessions[session].hash) == LLP_ERROR
00657                                 || llp_set_mac_out_key(session, mac_key) == LLP_ERROR) {
00658                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating mac_out_key.");
00659                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00660                 goto return_label;
00661         }
00662         
00663         return_value = LLP_OK;
00664 
00665 return_label:
00666 
00667         free(cipher_key);
00668         free(cipher_iv);
00669         free(mac_key);
00670         return LLP_ERROR;
00671 }
00672 /******************************************************************************/
00673 int verify_versions(u_char remote_major, u_char remote_minor) {
00674         /*
00675          * Boolean that controls if a log message informing about a new LLP version 
00676          * was found when a connection was being established with some host.
00677          */
00678         static int new_version_found = 0;
00679         
00680         /* Testing protocol major version implemented by remote peer. */
00681         if (remote_major != LLP_MAJOR_VERSION) {
00682                 liblog_warn(LAYER_LINK,
00683                                 "incompatible protocol versions: local: %d.%d; remote: %d.%d",
00684                                 LLP_MAJOR_VERSION, LLP_MINOR_VERSION, 
00685                                 remote_major, remote_minor);
00686                 if (remote_major > LLP_MAJOR_VERSION) {
00687                         liblog_info(LAYER_LINK,
00688                                         "remote peer uses version %d.%d, upgrade mandatory.",
00689                                 remote_major, remote_minor);
00690                                 new_version_found = 1;                  
00691                 }
00692                 return LLP_ERROR;
00693         }
00694         /* Comparing minor versions. */
00695         if (remote_minor > LLP_MINOR_VERSION && !new_version_found) {
00696                 liblog_info(LAYER_LINK,
00697                                 "remote peer uses version %d.%d, upgrade recommended.",
00698                                 remote_major, remote_minor);
00699                 new_version_found = 1;
00700         }
00701 
00702         return LLP_OK;
00703 }
00704 /******************************************************************************/
00705 int send_connection_request(int session) {
00706         int local_port;
00707         u_char packet[LLP_CONNECTION_REQUEST_MAX_LENGTH];
00708         char cipher_string[LLP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH];
00709         char hash_string[LLP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH];
00710         char mac_string[LLP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH];
00711                 
00712         /* Getting local port. */
00713         local_port = llp_get_port();
00714 
00715         llp_get_cipher_string(cipher_string, LLP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH);
00716         llp_get_hash_string(hash_string, LLP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH);
00717         llp_get_mac_string(mac_string, LLP_FUNCTION_LIST_MAX_LENGTH);
00718 
00719         /* Constructing connection request packet */
00720         UTIL_WRITE_START(packet)
00721         UTIL_WRITE_BYTE  (LLP_CONNECTION_REQUEST)
00722         UTIL_WRITE_BYTE  (LLP_MAJOR_VERSION)
00723         UTIL_WRITE_BYTE  (LLP_MINOR_VERSION)
00724         UTIL_WRITE_BYTE  (session)
00725         UTIL_WRITE_STRING(cipher_string)
00726         UTIL_WRITE_STRING(hash_string)
00727         UTIL_WRITE_STRING(mac_string)
00728         UTIL_WRITE_BYTES (llp_sessions[session].h_out, LLP_H_LENGTH)
00729         
00730         /* Sending packet. */
00731         if (llp_send_session_packet(session, packet, UTIL_WRITE_END) == LLP_ERROR) {
00732                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error sending packet.");
00733                 llp_close_session(session);
00734                 return LLP_ERROR;
00735         }
00736         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "packet sent.");
00737         
00738         return LLP_OK;
00739 }
00740 /******************************************************************************/
00741 int send_connection_ok(int session) {
00742         u_char packet[LLP_CONNECTION_OK_MAX_LENGTH];
00743         
00744         /* Constructing connection acknowledgement packet. */
00745         UTIL_WRITE_START (packet)
00746         UTIL_WRITE_BYTE  (LLP_CONNECTION_OK)
00747         UTIL_WRITE_BYTE  (llp_sessions[session].foreign_session)
00748         UTIL_WRITE_BYTE  (session)
00749         UTIL_WRITE_STRING(llp_sessions[session].cipher->name)
00750         UTIL_WRITE_STRING(llp_sessions[session].hash->name)
00751         UTIL_WRITE_STRING(llp_sessions[session].mac->name)
00752         UTIL_WRITE_BYTES (llp_sessions[session].h_out, LLP_H_LENGTH)
00753         UTIL_WRITE_MPINT (llp_sessions[session].y_out)
00754         
00755         /* Sending packet. */
00756         if (llp_send_session_packet(session, packet, UTIL_WRITE_END) == LLP_ERROR) {
00757                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error sending packet.");
00758                 return LLP_ERROR;
00759         }
00760         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "packet sent.");
00761 
00762         return LLP_OK;
00763 }
00764 /******************************************************************************/
00765 int send_key_exchange(int session) {
00766         u_char packet[LLP_KEY_EXCHANGE_MAX_LENGTH];
00767 
00768         /* Constructing key exchange packet. */
00769         UTIL_WRITE_START (packet)
00770         UTIL_WRITE_BYTE  (LLP_KEY_EXCHANGE)
00771         UTIL_WRITE_BYTE  (llp_sessions[session].foreign_session)
00772         UTIL_WRITE_MPINT (llp_sessions[session].y_out)
00773         
00774         /* Sending packet. */
00775         if (llp_send_session_packet(session, packet, UTIL_WRITE_END) == LLP_ERROR) {
00776                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "error sending packet.");
00777                 return LLP_ERROR;
00778         }
00779         
00780         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "packet sent.");
00781 
00782         return LLP_OK;
00783 }
00784 /******************************************************************************/
00785 int parse_connection_request(llp_packet_p *packet, u_char *packet_data, 
00786                 int packet_size) {
00787         
00788         UTIL_READ_START(packet_data, packet_size, LLP_OK, LLP_ERROR)
00789         UTIL_READ_BYTE(packet->type)
00790         UTIL_READ_BYTE(packet->llp_connection_request.major_version)
00791         UTIL_READ_BYTE(packet->llp_connection_request.minor_version)
00792         UTIL_READ_BYTE(packet->llp_connection_request.session)
00793         UTIL_READ_STRING(packet->llp_connection_request.ciphers)
00794         UTIL_READ_STRING(packet->llp_connection_request.hashes)
00795         UTIL_READ_STRING(packet->llp_connection_request.macs)
00796         UTIL_READ_BYTES(packet->llp_connection_request.h, LLP_H_LENGTH)
00797         UTIL_READ_END
00798 }       
00799 /******************************************************************************/
00800 int parse_connection_ok(llp_packet_p *packet, u_char *packet_data,
00801                 int packet_length) {
00802         
00803         UTIL_READ_START(packet_data, packet_length, LLP_OK, LLP_ERROR)
00804         UTIL_READ_BYTE(packet->type)
00805         UTIL_READ_BYTE(packet->llp_connection_ok.session_dst)
00806         UTIL_READ_BYTE(packet->llp_connection_ok.session_src)
00807         UTIL_READ_STRING(packet->llp_connection_ok.cipher)
00808         UTIL_READ_STRING(packet->llp_connection_ok.hash)
00809         UTIL_READ_STRING(packet->llp_connection_ok.mac)
00810         UTIL_READ_BYTES(packet->llp_connection_ok.h, LLP_H_LENGTH)
00811         UTIL_READ_MPINT(packet->llp_connection_ok.y)
00812         UTIL_READ_END
00813 }
00814 /******************************************************************************/
00815 int parse_key_exchange(llp_packet_p *packet, u_char *packet_data,
00816                 int packet_length) {
00817         UTIL_READ_START(packet_data, packet_length, LLP_OK, LLP_ERROR)
00818         UTIL_READ_BYTE(packet->type)
00819         UTIL_READ_BYTE(packet->llp_key_exchange.session)
00820         UTIL_READ_MPINT(packet->llp_key_exchange.y)
00821         UTIL_READ_END
00822 }
